welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haro, Spain! Prepare to be enchanted by our charming city known for its rich history, delicious wines, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that Haro has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vitoria Airport handles both domestic and international flights, with a variety of amenities and services available for passengers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vitoria Airport is a major hub for air freight, serving a variety of industries and offering efficient and secure handling of goods.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access provided for a limited time and paid options for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
